name: veg Biriyani
description: A flavorful symphony of basmati rice, tender veggies, and aromatic spices

name: veg fried rice
description: A flavorful fusion of fluffy rice, vibrant veggies, and tender meats, stir-fried to perfection!

name: veg noodles
description: Enjoy a delightful medley of crisp vegetables and perfectly cooked noodles, tossed in savory sauces for a mouthwatering experience in every bite!

name: veg soup
description: Savor the hearty blend of fresh vegetables and fragrant herbs simmered to perfection, delivering warmth and nourishment in every spoonful.

name: ghee rice
description: Indulge in the aromatic, buttery goodness of basmati rice cooked to perfection with rich ghee and subtle spices, offering a simple yet luxurious taste experience.

name: roti
description: Enjoy the rustic charm of soft, freshly baked flatbread, perfect for soaking up flavors and complementing every meal with its light, tender texture.

name: butter naan
description: Sink into the pillowy softness of freshly baked naan, brushed with rich, melted butter for an indulgent, melt-in-your-mouth experience.

name: panner butter masala
description: Savor the velvety goodness of paneer cubes in a luscious, buttery tomato sauce, infused with aromatic spices that create a perfect balance of flavors in every bite.

name: cashew peas masala
description: Delight in the velvety blend of tender peas and rich cashews, simmered in a flavorful masala sauce that promises a luxurious and satisfying dining experience.

name: mushroom pepper fry
description: Savor the robust flavors of saut√©ed mushrooms, tossed with aromatic spices and a generous dash of black pepper, creating a tantalizing dish that packs a punch.

name: gobi manchurian
description: Crispy cauliflower florets coated in a spicy, tangy sauce for a delightful fusion of flavors.

name: chole puri
description: Hot crispy puri served with Savor the velvety goodness of channa cubes in a luscious, tomato sauce, infused with aromatic spices that create a perfect balance of flavors in every bite

name: Idly sambar
description: Discover the perfect harmony of soft, airy idlis and soul-warming sambar a South Indian delight that promises comfort with every bite!

name: masala dosa
description: A crispy crepe with spicy potato masala, served with sambar and coconut chutney. This South Indian delight blends textures and flavors perfectly.

name: pongal
description: A creamy blend of rice and lentils, flavored with ghee, black pepper, and cumin. This aromatic South Indian dish is perfect for any meal.

name: veg pulao
description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with mixed vegetables, aromatic spices, and herbs. This delightful meal offers a burst of flavors and vibrant colors in every bite.

name: pani puri
description: Crisp, hollow spheres filled with spicy, tangy water, potatoes, and chickpeas. This street food favorite bursts with flavors in every bite.

name: dahi puri
description: Crisp puris topped with tangy yogurt, spiced potatoes, and chutneys.

name: pav bhaji
description: Spiced mashed vegetables served with buttery bread rolls. This Mumbai classic delivers hearty, flavorful comfort in every bite.

name: chocolate milkshake
description: A rich, creamy blend of smooth chocolate and cold milk, topped with whipped cream. This indulgent treat is pure bliss in every sip.

name: vanilla milkshake
description: A creamy mix of vanilla ice cream and milk, topped with whipped cream. A classic treat that's pure indulgence in every sip.

name: black currant ice cream
description: A tangy, creamy delight bursting with vibrant blackcurrant flavor. This refreshing treat is a perfect blend of sweet and tart.

name: strawberry ice cream
description: A creamy, fruity delight packed with sweet, ripe strawberries. This refreshing treat offers a burst of summer in every bite.

name: belgian chocolate ice cream
description: Creamy and rich, made with velvety Belgian chocolate. A decadent treat in every bite.

name: butter scotch ice cream
description: Smooth and creamy with a rich, caramelized butterscotch flavor. This indulgent treat offers a perfect blend of sweet and buttery goodness.
